io.sphere.sdk.facets

Class SelectFacetImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.facets.SelectFacetImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the resource for this facet (e.g. ProductProjection)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Facet<T>, SelectFacet<T>

    public class SelectFacetImpl<T>
extends io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
implements SelectFacet<T>
    Select facet that allows to manipulate the facet options via a FacetOptionMapper. This enables any desired behaviour, such as replacing the values for its localized names or building hierarchies out of the flat list of options received from the search result. As this facet has no particular type, it is required to also provide the associated facet type.
